parameters.name: PaperSz
parameters.description: Paper size as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e

parameters.name: FirstAngle
parameters.description: True if you want first angle projection, false if not

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Custom paper width if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Custom paper height if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

title: ISheet.SetProperties
signature:
void SetProperties( 
   System.Int32
PaperSz
,
   System.Int32
Templ
,
   System.Double
Scale1
,
   System.Double
Scale2
,
   System.Boolean
FirstAngle
,
   System.Double
Width
,
   System.Double
Height
)

parameters.name: PaperSz
parameters.description: Paper size as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e

parameters.name: FirstAngle
parameters.description: True if you want first angle projection, false if not

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Custom paper width if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Custom paper height if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

remarks:
If you specify a custom template, then the current custom template is used by this sheet until you call
ISheet::SetTemplateName
and pass in a different custom template name.
NOTE
:
If Templ does not match the PaperSz specification, then you get a template that does not fit the paper size. This parameter does not override the PaperSz setting. Also, if you change the scale of the sheet using Scale1 and Scale2, then any drawing view that is set to use the sheet's scale takes the new scale setting.
You can also use
ISheet::SetSize
to set the size of the sheet and the standard sheet size.
